getCultures

public java.util.List<Culture> getCultures()
The list of Cultures accepted by the user agent. The list is ordered according to rules of the Accept-Language HTTP header.

Returns:
a list of accepted Cultures.

getCulture

public Culture getCulture()
The most likely Culture accepted by the user agent. Selects the most preferable Culture according to the rules of the Accept-Language HTTP header.

Returns:
The most likely Culture accepted by the user agent.

the current HttpChannel.

public HttpUrl getRefererUrl()
The URL of the Referer. The Referer is a page that linked to this one.

Returns:
the origin of the request.

getRequestMethod

public HttpMethod getRequestMethod()
The HttpMethod called from the user agent.

the HttpMethod that being called from the user agent.

getAuthenticatedSubject

public Subject getAuthenticatedSubject()

Returns:

getAgent

public HttpUserAgent getAgent()
Information on the user agent that made the request.

Returns:
a HttpUserAgent object with the current user agent.
